original: intros HX HY. apply discrete_iff. apply decidable_iff in HX. apply decidable_iff in HY. destruct HX as [fX HX]. destruct HY as [fY HY]. exists (fun '(x, y) => fX x && fY y). intros [x1 y1] [x2 y2]. specialize (HX x1 x2). specialize (HY y1 y2). destruct (fX x1), (fY y1), (fX x2), (fY y2); try (apply Decidable.decides_refl); try (apply Decidable.decides_false); auto.
